Documentation: Is the unique identification of a client.
Each outbound delivery has an unique identifier, the outbound delivery number. Outbound deliveries of different clients and system partners can however have the same delivery number.
Unique identification of a system partner (see SystemPartner).
The associated line of the initial system partner telegram. If a delivery line is added within WAMAS, then this number is set to 0.
It is part of the unique identification of the outbound delivery line. When the line was created via the interface, it is equal to the 'sysPartnerLine'.
Is the unique identification of a client.
The outbound order number is part of the unique identifier of the outbound order.
Unique identification of a system partner (see SystemPartner).
The associated line of the initial system partner telegram. If an order line is added within WAMAS, then this number is set to 0.
It is part of the unique identification of the outbound order line. When the line was created via the interface, it is equal to the 'sysPartnerLine'.
